Shared hosting packages start at $4 aud per month ($2.7USD).

**Hilbert 1**
10GB NVMe Disk
100GB Bandwidth
5 Addon Domains
Free SSL
Free daily backups
Unlimited Emails
PHP Selector
Litespeed + LS Caching
Applications Installer (WordPress, Joomla, Drupal, etc)
Free 1 Year Domain Registration*

$4aud per month (inc GST)

To view all of our packages, please go to: https://quantumcore.com.au/hosting

We also offer competitive reseller hosting. You can view these plans here: https://quantumcore.com.au/reseller


*Applicable with annual packages only
*Extensions available: asn.au, id.au, org.au, .net.au, com.au, .com, .net

----------------------------------
Quantum Core is 100% Australian owned and operated and the team behind Quantum Core has over 40 years experience in the Web Hosting industry.

Our servers have a 1GB link, Intel GoldLake CPU's with clock speeds of 3GHz+ and is purely NVMe storage.

Quantum Core servers are located in Equinix Data Centres in Sydney.

We have a Looking glass available at: https://lg.quantumcore.com.au
